name: The Kite Runner Racer - Puzzle Racing Game
name_original: The Kite Runner Racer - Puzzle Racing Game
description:
Soar majestically through the sky while navigating your way through the clouds and making it to the finish line as quickly as possible. Play by yourself or challenge a friend in our new multiplayer mode!

As you continue on your journey, you'll encounter flying airplanes, warp zones, lightning strikes, and hot air balloons blocking your path.

Push yourself to complete each level as fast as possible, but be careful not to let any part of the kite or it's tail touch any of the clouds or obstacles. Sounds easy right? You'll quickly find that your biggest challenge becomes yourself as your nerves may begin to unravel when you push yourself to go even faster than you thought was possible.

Kite Racer provides hours of entertainment with over 100 unique levels that get progressively more challenging. The levels are divided up in 7 boards, with 16 levels in each board. Think you completed a board in record time? Submit your score and see how well you rank! You can share your score with friends with a single click of the "Share" button!

Want to gain an edge? Visit the Shop where you can upgrade your kite to gain awesome advantages which will give you everything you need to beat the levels in record time!!!
